desc: OFFICIAL ECOHYDRA SHOP - Effective, Alcohol-free, Moisturising Hand Sanitiser and Hand Wash which kills up to 99.9999% of common bacteria - including Norovirus. Suitable for children and babies.

layout.text:
Designed to reduce the spread of germs & viruses, our
alcohol-free multi-purpose disinfectant surface spray
can be used on all surfaces and kills coronaviruses.
